title: Life is Strange Studio Trouble & Star Wars Outlaws Trailer Coming - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.05.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start & Kyle Hilliard from Game Informer is Here!
00:08:07 - Housekeeping
 - Right after this episode of KFGD, another episode of Game Showdown premieres featuring Janet Garcia, Imran Khan, and Tamoor Hussain! Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
      -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:44 - REQUIRED READING: A big story dropped today about Deck Nine - https://www.ign.com/articles/how-hidden-nazi-symbols-were-the-tip-of-a-toxic-iceberg-at-life-is-strange-developer-deck-nine
00:20:59 - A story trailer for Star Wars Outlaws is coming next week
00:36:36 - Reminder: Online play for Wii U and 3DS will shut down on Monday
00:40:31 - Stellar Blade will receive New Game Plus and free skins as DLC
00:42:36 - Wee News!
00:43:49 - SuperChats
00:48:37 - You‘re Wrong

you guys should go read everything because there is a lot early last year while working on the next entry in the life of strange franchise a few developers at deck 9 stumbled upon something that didn't belong in their game Nazi symbols initially developers noticed a reference to the number 88 and flagged the issue to their bosses assuming it was an innocent mistake but in the ensuing weeks others found more problematic signs in in Universe labels such as a reference such as references to a racist meme the number 18 and the the haggle Rune as the number of possible hate symbols mounted staff grew increasingly concerned that someone was putting these items in their game deliberately as a dog whistle to white supremacists Nazi imagery would be inappropriate in most games but in a life of strange title the dissonance was especially frightening since its Inception the series has been lotted for thoughtful portrayals of marginalized individuals its most recent entry life is strange True

strange title the dissonance was especially frightening since its Inception the series has been lotted for thoughtful portrayals of marginalized individuals its most recent entry life is strange True Colors won games for impact of the game awards in 2021 and a glad media award for outstanding video game with such a reputation developers tell me there was an exception that any whiff of hate speech would be immediately removed and thoroughly investigated but as the weeks went by management remained silent and staff unrest grew this wasn't the first time Executives had failed to act when marginalized individuals at the studio felt unsafe according to over a dozen current and former employees across several departments most of whom spoke to me on condition of anonymity for fear of reprisal deck 9's management has long let a toxic work culture Fester at the studio they claim the SE Suite has protected multiple abusive leaders encouraged Crunch and allowed bullying of individuals advocating

to as bullies um by a lot of the de9 employees and then it goes back to say well it wasn't just the Publishers fault though the leadership at deck 9 was also a major issue um specifically citing out um one of the the higher ups there and a lot of the problematic things that he did um to foster a very very toxic workplace there Kyle any initial thoughts on this yeah I mean I'm coming into this cold I hadn't seen this story yet so I'm sort of learning it in real time and uh it's just continually frustrating when these stories pop up I mean I'm I'm really happy to see Rebecca Valentine like writing these kinds of stories but I'm even more impressed by the the employees and the women you know in the studio who are stepping up to say something to like Elevate this and get it make it known that's so hard that that is such a difficult scary thing to do but I think it's like long term it's helpful to see these kinds of stories get out there um but it doesn't make it any less frustrating and
